title: GOLUB logo
content:
Hi friends

Please help me ID the font used for GOLUB logo

Thanks in advance

Hernando

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110333im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Plain%20Golub%20Blue%20Logo_4914.jpg)
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content:
This looks like many techno fonts that are freebies. I thought [this one](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110333/http:/www.dafont.com/rns-serial.font?nb_ppp=50&text=GOLUB) (RNS Serial) would be close enough to tweak into the same look as the logo.

- Mike Yanega
